mapper.select: SELECT r.review_code as reviewCode, p.id as productCode, p.name as productName, r.review_title as reviewTitle, r.review_content as reviewContent, r.created_date as createdDate, r.modified_date as modifiedPerson, m.no as memberCode, m.name as memberName FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_code = m.id JOIN product p ON r.product_code = p.id ORDER BY r.review_code DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( product_code, member_code, review_title, review_content, created_person, modified_person ) VALUES ( #{productCode}, #{memberCode}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{memberCode}, #{memberCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_code as reviewCode, p.id as productCode, p.name as productName, r.review_title as reviewTitle, r.review_content as reviewContent, r.created_date as createdDate, r.modified_date as modifiedPerson, m.no as memberCode, m.name as memberName FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_code = m.id JOIN product p ON r.product_code = p.id WHERE r.review_code = #{reviewCode} ORDER BY r.review_code DESC

SELECT p.id AS productCode, p.name AS productName, p.price AS productPrice, p.content AS productDescription, p.status AS productOrderable, p.product_image_url AS productImageUrl, c.id AS companyId, c.name AS companyName FROM product p JOIN company c ON p.company_id = c.id WHERE p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND p.status = 'y' ORDER BY p.id DESC
